item.description:
The Night Kitchen! We have had so many people ask us about The Night Kitchen and now we have an EatUp! there in a couple of weeks. Hoorray!

This event will be $40.00 and that included both tax and tip, so really the only expense that night will by any wine or alcoholic beverage you'd like to order. A real bargain for this meal!

We will also be preordering our food (as we have done in the past a few times), here are the menu choices for entrees (appetizer, salad and dessert are all the same): (no need to respond to this email, just register with the link below and you will be asked to choose an entree there)



  • Mushroom & gruyere pudding with black trumpet & burgundy reduction

  • Maple - bourbon glazed quail with wild rice, cranberry & pecan stuffing

  • Crab stuffed rainbow trout with pink grapefruit & stoli beurre blanc



here are some rave reviews from the 'net:

Yelp!: I'm so happy to hear that the word is out about the Night Kitchen. This is the best restaurant in the Pioneer Valley - period. The food is sublime - a small menu consisting of local ingredients cooked to perfection - the waitstaff is friendly, accommodating, and professional, and the setting is beautiful for a date or a casual dinner out.

Chowhound: Excellent food, modest prices for the quality of ingredients and preparation, good wines without inflated prices, pleasant staff and beautiful location in an old mill building on the edge of a river. It shares the building with a great used book store, the Montague Book Mill, which makes for a swell extended afternoon-evening visit.

Sounds like a great time, I know we are looking forward to the experience. Hope to see you there!

Christine & Jessica
item.name: The Night Kitchen in Montague-the people's choice!
